Description:
Art by our very own @Monchi

Please review the rules before making an account and posting!
Also please read the Policy page at https://rodent.life/privacy-policy if you are thinking about applying. Our timelines are public, so you don't need a login to view. This instance is largely English-speaking with federation to English and Japanese speaking instances. Registration is currently invite-only.

About rodent.life

rodent.life (informally abbreviated RoLi) is a furry Fediverse community running on Mastodon. As a furry community there is an appreciation for art and artists and we do what we can to support them and provide a space to openly create and network. There may be posts in our timelines from LGBTQIA+ focused instances and from tech industry focused instances where some of our interests overlap. But this is primarily a space for furries.

In order to maintain an inclusive and welcoming space, we do have to set some ground rules. As such, this is not a “free speech” instance, where anything goes. We choose to federate as openly as possible within the restrictions of the rules and moderation expectations set below.

Hashtags

Like other social media platforms, Mastodon makes use of hashtags. Feel free to tag in English, Japanese, or both. (ex. #rabbit #兎 #うさぎ ) This instance can search either. Please do use tags though, especially with images. They are used to help people that want to find your content and to use in filters for people that do not want to see it.

Content Warnings

Unlike other social media platforms, Mastodon makes use of a feature called a Content Warning (CW). This feature effectively acts as a “spoiler” for the content of your post. The only text presented is the set of tags that the poster chooses to describe the content with. This allows you to give your audience the chance to consent to the content that you are choosing to reveal to them. Some of the rules require the use of Content Warnings, so please familiarize yourself with them. (This instance also has a pretty high character limit, and using a CW with the subject of a longer post should be done to keep the timelines clean.)

To other instance admins and whoever is curious about the moderation

Users here may post media that is not acceptable on other instances (typically artwork, as explicit photography is not allowed). If a post from originating from rodent.life contains explicit media, it is required to have a CW and be adequately censored. I encourage the use of tags regardless. If you admin/moderate an instance that resides in a location where such imagery is not legal, or have users that may be sensitive to such content, I recommend at a minimum rejecting media from rodent.life .

If another instance sends uncensored explicit media, this instance will reject media from it, regardless of whether or not there is a CW. If users from another instance are filling the Federated timelime with hate speech of any kind, and the Rules of that server disallow it, this instance will suspend the user (and likely attempt to reach out to the admin of the remote instance). If that happens and the Rules of another server allow such behaviour, this instance will simply suspend that instance outright.

If users in another instance are in some way in violation of the other Rules of this server (AI art posted, bot accounts, non-furry accounts, etc.) such users will likely be limited at admin discretion. If this happens a lot, or an instance seems to exist entirely for a purpose that breaks a Rule here (caters almost exclusively to bots, exists to promote a corporate account/brand), that instance will likely be suspended at admin discretion.

If the admin/moderation team of another instance publicly attempts to cause reputational harm (FediBlock posts, blocklist public messages, etc.) to rodent.life or its administration, it will be grounds for suspension of the remote instance.

Funding

At this time, this instance is funded by an individual. It does not cost enough to justify asking for more. I would encourage spending that money within the community, possibly helping out a lesser-known artist that needs it more than I do.

Custom Emoji

Nearly all of these icons have a requirement that they are used respectfully, and not to disparage the associated product. Please be respectful when using these custom emoji, and feel free to read the specific guidelines if there are any questions. Please report any violations on rodent.life to admin@rabbitpa.ws or open a report for the user/post on rodent.life .

Inkbunny - Emoji Code :inkbunny: - rodent.life received approval to use the logo for a custom emoji from the staff at inkbunny.net on April 27th 2023, provided we get permission from the artist, Shiuk, as well. Shiuk gave permission for rodent.life to use the art for an emoji on April 28th 2023.

Empfehlungen

Die folgende Liste ist eine Sammlung von Verhaltensweisen, die wir von unseren Benutzer*innen erwarten. Wenn du siehst, dass jemand auf eine Weise gegen diese Empfehlungen verstößt, die dich stört, reiche bitte einen Meldung ein. Während diese Empfehlungen als Richtlinien für eine gute Gemeinschaftsinstanz gedacht sind, wird eine wiederholte böswillige Unwilligkeit, die Empfehlungen zu befolgen, als Verstoß gegen eine Regel angesehen.

  • Allgemein: Verwende die bereitgestellten Tools, um eine rücksichtsvolle und zugängliche Atmosphäre zu fördern. Dazu gehören die großzügige Verwendung von Inhaltsnotizen (teils auch als "Content Warning", "Inhaltswarnung" oder "CW" bezeichnet), insbesondere bei potenziell problematischen oder kontroversen Themen sowie Alternativtext-Beschriftungen von Mediendateien.

  • Von ungebetenen Kommentaren über die persönlichen Entscheidungen, den Lebensstil oder die Familie einer anderen Person wird dringend abgeraten, dies kann als Belästigung angesehen werden. Unangemessene Sexualisierung und unerwünschte Kommentare über das Aussehen werden nicht toleriert (sofern kein Konsens besteht).
  • Wenn du sexuelle Inhalte postst, nutze Inhaltsnotizen und markiere Medien als "NSFW".
  • Wenn du Werbung postest, nutze Inhaltsnotizen. Werbung sollte nicht übermäßig oder automatisiert erfolgen.
  • Bots dürfen nur mit Benutzer*innen interagieren, die dem zugestimmt haben.
  • Automatisierte Posts und hochfrequente Posts sollten nicht gelistet sein (für alle sichtbar, aber nicht auf der lokalen Timeline erscheinen), damit die lokale Timeline unserer Instanz ein Ort des Community-Dialogs und der menschlichen Interaktion sein kann. Dies gilt auch für Bots, Feed-Poster, Twitter-„Retweets“ und Twitter-Crossposts mit fehlerhaften Erwähnungen („…@twitter.com“). Crossposter-Konten, die keine aktiven Teilnehmer in unserer Community sind, können nach Ermessen der Moderation entfernt werden.
  • Beibe in Diskussionen bitte höflich und beleidige nicht die Personen, mit denen du sprichst. Beachte, dass sich Ironie, Sarkasmus oder ähnliche Ausdrucksweisen nicht gut in geschriebene Sprache übertragen lassen und dazu neigen, Diskussionen oder Missverständnisse eskalieren zu lassen.

上記を使ったからと言って法令に反する投稿が許されるわけではありません。

■システムに負荷をかける利用はしないでください。

サーバーに過度な負荷をかけるBotなどは禁止です。


■「当鯖のアカウントは全員18歳以上です。」（18歳以下の利用を制限するものではありません。）

■違反時の処置

上記に違反した場合は該当アカウントに対して「警告」「利用停止」の措置を取ります。
また、投稿についてもこちらで削除する場合があります。

Land Acknowledgement

We recognize and honour that coales.co is physically hosted and managed in Moh’kinsstis on Treaty 7 Territory, the traditional homeland of the Siksika, Kainai, Piikani, Iyarhe Nakoda and Tsuut’ina Nations as well as Region 3 of the Metis Nation.

Code of Conduct

Site administration reserves the right to suspend or remove users that do not behave in a civil manner. Specific guidelines are being further developed and will be placed here as the site develops.

Inappropriate Content

Users who post inappropriate content will be suspended after a warning. Repeat offenders will be permanently banned.

  • Advertisements of any kind without the express written permission of site administration are PROHIBITED. Please ask permission before posting anything of a commercial nature
  • Bots are allowed only if they do not clutter the timeline or engage with other users without their permission. Please contact site administration before using bots to be sure they are appropriate!
  • Content that is considered obscene, libelous, hate speech or otherwise unlawful under Canadian law will be removed immediately and the user who posted it banned without warning
  • Personal attacks, derogatory remarks or discriminatory behaviour towards others based on ANY personal characteristics will not be tolerated!
  • Accounts that mislead or misrepresent the true identity of a user will be banned immediately (no fake celebrities allowed unless the profile explicitly states it is fake!)
  • Harassment, bullying or otherwise inciting hatred against others is prohibited
  • Users are responsible for vetting articles/links they post or share. Users who deliberately and repeatedly post "fake news" without stating it is as such will be suspended or banned.

Content Warnings

The Mastodon platform offers a "content warning" feature that obscures post content until a user explicitly opens it. This allows for sensitive information or potentially offensive or distressing content to be hidden from those who do not wish to see it. The following should be placed within content warnings:

  • Any level of violence, nudity or sexual content that would be deemed higher than a "PG" rating
  • Anything that would be considered a "spoiler" when discussing popular movies, television shows, sporting events or current events
  • Sensitive topics which may incite excessively heated arguments. Keep in mind that healthy lively discussion is encouraged and users are NOT expected to conceal everything that might be the slightest bit disagreeable!

Blocked Instances

Users of this instance are encouraged to use self moderation to silence and block at a user level. However as the federated Web grows there may be clear cases where an entire instance is clearly engaging in questionable behaviour. Instance level silencing and suspensions on this instance are implemented on an "as need" or complaint basis as their content appears in this instance's timelines, and on occasion preemptively based on others' block lists after manual review by administrators if deemed appropriate. That said reports WILL be taken seriously and required actions will be taken swiftly

Description:
About Rage.Love (EN)

The Rage

We have enough of all the systematic bias that destroy lives.
We had enough of the patriarchy.
We had enough of the colonialism and the racism.
We had enough of the capitalistic system.
No TERF, no SWERF, no Nazi, no Centrist

The Love

We care for each other
We care for the living
We care for the land
We remember who we lost and what they fought for

Rules and Etiquette

Welcome! Please feel free to join us here, if you do, know that we ask everyone to keep a few things in mind. The following list is not exhaustive, and will be modified and expanded over time. Look, if you get it and you you're good with it, great. If you don't get it, figure it out - we can help! If you don't want to get it, maybe find somewhere else to hang your hat.

Be you

This is a space to celebrate our diversity. Here you don't need to be a brand, be true to yourself and let others do the same.

Cultivate a Safe Atmosphere

Harassment will not be tolerated, oppressive behavior will not be tolerated, and while failure to recognize the boundaries of others may be met at first with a gentle attempt to educate you, repeated failure will not be tolerated.

Share Things

Talk about what you are up to! Talk to other people about what they are up to! Make things! Share you patreon! Post your art! Share your knowledge! ask the questions that keep you awake at night.

Banal Bullshit Unwelcome

There's nothing interesting about homophobia, transphobia, racism, sexism or any of the other unexamined default settings some people grow up with. Being a nazi isn't an opinion, it's shitty and aggressively boring - take it somewhere else. You can feel free to disagree somewhere else where none of us have to hear you. Enforced strictly.

Standing on the Shoulders of Giants

Rules, Etiquette, Bots, block list

We are very thankful to other community like weirder.earth and sleeping.town and the people running them. They allow people to use their extensive rules, policies and hard gained knowledge about unsafe communities out there.

Emojos

This community uses Mutant Standard emoji, which are licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.

Moderation

The current moderation is done by 4 (four) persons with varying amount of spoons. Allow 24 hours for answers, actions and replies .

To repport a toot, click the "3" dots menu and click report. It will allow you to select one or more toot. You'll also be able to add a note for the moderators to see.

We are looking for help to moderate this community, we would appreciate people from different background, life experience and geographies. We are currently pale and fairly euro-centric.

To do so and improve bias, we will favorite people that are not cis men, hetero, white, able, european. To apply send a DM to @admin@rage.love, the process is not formalised and might take a while.

Rage Dot Love will suspend any instance launched, acquired or funded by Alphabet, Facebook, Twitter, Microsoft, Apple, Amazon, Elsevier or similar corporation.

The Art

Burning bottles by Kaerhon (website: https://krhn.xyz)
Great person to commission art from

Sobre Rage.Love (ES)

Traducido por Caógena

La ira

Estamos hartes de la discriminación sistemática y destructora de vidas
Estamos hartes del patriarcado
Estamos hartes del colonialismo y del racismo
Estamos hartes del sistema capitalista
Nada de pseudo-feministas transmísiques (TERF) ni abolicionistas (SWERF); nada de nazis; nada de centristas

El amor

Nos cuidamos les unes a les otres
Cuidamos a quienes viven
Cuidamos la tierra
Recordamos a quienes perdimos y las causas de sus luchas

Reglas y etiqueta

¡Bienvenide! Siéntete libre de unírtenos; y de hacerlo, te pedimos que por favor tengas un par de cosas en cuenta (esto se lo pedimos a todes). La lista que sigue no es exhaustiva, y se la irá modificando y expaniendo con el tiempo. A ver, si lo captas y no tienes problema, pues bien; si no lo captas, búscale la vuelta (¡te ayudamos si quieres!). Mas si no quieres captarlo, capaz sea mejor que te instales en otro sitio.

Sé tú misme

Este espacio está para celebrar nuestra diversidad. Acá no necesitas ser una marca; sé genuine y permite que les demás lo sean.

Cultiva una atmósfera segura

No se tolerarán ni el acoso ni los comportamientos abusivos. Y si bien puede que al comienzo se intente corregir con gentileza a quien no reconozca los límites de les demás, no se tolerará la negligencia reiterada.

Comparte cosas

¡Comparte las cosas que andas haciendo! ¡Habla con otra gente sobre lo que elles andan haciendo! ¡Haz cosas! ¡Comparte tu Patreon! ¡Publica tu arte! ¡Comparte tus conocimientos! Haz las preguntas que te mantienen despierte por las noches.

Nada de sandeces banales

No tienen nada de interesante ni la homomisia, ni la transmisia, ni el racismo, ni el sexismo ni ninguna de las configuraciones predeterminadas con las que crecen algunas personas. Ser une nazi o fache no es una opinión, sino que te hace una persona de mierda e insufriblemente aburrida; así que será mejor te vayas con eso para otro lado. Puedes expresar tu desacuerdo con total libertad donde ningune de nosotres te tenga que hacer caso. Esta política se hace cumplir de manera estricta.

Sobre los hombros de gigantes

Reglas, etiqueta, bots, listas de bloqueos

Estamos muy agradecides con comunidades como weirder.earth y sleeping.town, así como con la gente que las administran, porque permiten que otres usen sus extensas reglas y políticas, y también el conocimiento que con esfuerzo han obtenido acerca de cuáles comunides son inseguras.

Emojos

Esta comunidad usa los emoji del Mutant Standard, que tienen una Licencia Creative Commons Atribución-NoComercial-CompartirIgual 4.0 Internacional.

Moderación

Actualmente son 4 (cuatro) las personas que se encargan de la moderación, y cada una varía en la cantidad de tiempo, esfuerzo y dedicación que puede ofrecer. Se agradece otorgar 24 horas para recibir explicaciones, acciones o respuestas.

Para reportar un toot, haz clic en el menú de los tres puntitos y luego haz clic en “reportar”. Esto te permitirá seleccionar uno o más toots. También podrás añadir una nota para les moderadores.

Estamos buscando ayuda para moderar esta comunidad. Apreciaríamos que fueran personas de distintos trasfondos, experiencias de vida y geografías. Actualmente somos pálides y bien eurocéntriques.

Con ese fin y para mejorar la situación con los sesgos, daremos preferencia a las personas que no sean u hombres cis, o blancas, o no discapacitadas, o europeas. Para optar manda un mensaje directo a directo a @admin@rage.love; el proceso no está formalizado y pudiera tomar un rato.

Rage Punto Love suspenderá cualquier instancia que haya sido creada, adquirida o financiada por Alphabet, Facebook, Twitter, Microsoft, Apple, Amazon, Elsevier o cualquier otra corporación parecida.

El arte

El arte de las botellas llameantes lo hizo Kaerhon (página: https://krhn.xyz).
Muy recomendable pedirle arte por comisión.

Riguardo Rage.Love (IT)

Tradotto da mms

La rabbia

Ne abbiamo abbastanza di tutti i pregiudizi sistematici che distruggono vite.
Ne abbiamo abbastanza del patriarcato.
Ne abbiamo abbastanza del colonialismo e del razzismo.
Ne abbiamo abbastanza del sistema capitalistico.
No TERF (femminista radicale trans-escludente), no SWERF (femminista radicale sex-worker-escludente), no nazistǝ, no centristǝ.

L'amore

Ci prendiamo cura l'unǝ dell'altrǝ.
Ci prendiamo cura deǝ vivǝ.
Ci prendiamo cura della terra.
Ricordiamo chi abbiamo perso e per cosa hanno combattuto.

Regole ed etichetta

Benvenutǝ! Sentitevi liberǝ di unirvi a noi. Se lo fate, sappiate che chiediamo a tuttǝ di tenere a mente alcune cose. La seguente lista non è esaustiva e sarà modificata e ampliata nel tempo. Guarda, se lo capisci e ti sta bene, bene. Se non lo capisci, cerca di capirlo - possiamo aiutarti! Se non vuoi capirlo, magari trova un altro posto dove appendere il tuo cappello.

Sii te stessǝ

Questo è uno spazio per celebrare la nostra diversità. Qui non c'è bisogno di essere un marchio, sii fedele a te stessǝ e lascia che lǝ altrǝ facciano lo stesso.

Coltivare un'atmosfera sicura

Le molestie non saranno tollerate, i comportamenti oppressivi non saranno tollerati e, mentre il mancato riconoscimento dei limiti degli altri può essere incontrato all'inizio con un gentile tentativo di educare, il fallimento ripetuto non sarà tollerato.

Condivisione

Parla di quello che stai facendo. Parla con lǝ altrǝ di quello che stanno facendo. Fai delle cose! Condividi il tuo patreon! Pubblica la tua arte! Condividi le tue conoscenze! Fai le domande che ti tengono svegliǝ la notte.

Banali stronzate non gradite

Non c'è niente di interessante nell'omofobia, nella transfobia, nel razzismo, nel sessismo o in qualsiasi altro comportamento internalizzato con cui alcune persone crescono. Essere un nazista non è un'opinione, è merdoso e aggressivamente noioso - portalo da qualche altra parte. Puoi sentirti liberǝ di non essere d'accordo da qualche altra parte dove nessunǝ di noi deve sentirti. Applicato rigorosamente.

Sulle spalle dei giganti

Regole, etichetta, bot, lista di blocco

Siamo molto grati ad altre comunità come weirder.earth e sleeping.town e alle persone che le gestiscono. Permettono alle persone di usare le loro regole estese, le politiche e la conoscenza duramente acquisita sulle comunità non sicure là fuori.

Emojos

Questa comunità utilizza le emoji Mutant Standard, che sono rilasciate sotto licenza Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.

Moderazione

L'attuale moderazione è fatta da 4 (quattro) persone con una quantità variabile di disponibilità. Consentire 24 ore per le risposte, le azioni e le risposte.

Per segnalare un commento, cliccate sul menu a "3" punti e cliccate su segnalazione. Vi permetterà di selezionare uno o più toot. Potrai anche aggiungere una nota per i moderatori.

Stiamo cercando aiuto per moderare questa comunità, apprezzeremmo persone con diversi background, esperienze di vita e geografie. Attualmente siamo pallidi e abbastanza euro-centrici.

Per fare ciò e migliorare la parzialità, preferiremmo persone che non siano uomini cis, etero, bianchi, abili, europei. Per candidarsi inviare un DM a @admin@rage.love, il processo non è formalizzato e potrebbe richiedere un po' di tempo.

Rage Dot Love sospenderà qualsiasi istanza lanciata, acquisita o finanziata da Alphabet, Facebook, Twitter, Microsoft, Apple, Amazon, Elsevier o corporation simili.

L'arte

Burning bottles di Kaerhon (sito web: https://krhn.xyz).
Grande persona a cui commissionare arte.

Donations

Description:
About us

This server is part of the smol internet. The smol internet is an initiative from a group of friends who share a certain weariness of huge internet services that exploit their users, and a love for openness, the internet, and pangolins. We hope you enjoy it. We are based in Sweden and so are most of our current users.

The server is run on a voluntary basis by a small group of friends. Please be patient in case of downtime and while waiting for responses from us.

Account requests

If requests are open, you are welcome to request an account! Please provide a reason for the request that makes it clear that you are an actual person, and why you think you will like this particular server. We may deny very short impersonal requests.

Contribute

If you would like to contribute towards the operations of this server, you can do so using Liberapay: liberapay.com/micke/ or buy buying some sweet merch:

  • smolnet.myspreadshop.com (US)
  • smolnet.myspreadshop.se (Europe)

Description:
PenguinHUBについて

運営目的

PenguinHUBは、主にペンギンが好きで好きでたまらない人向けのコミュニケーションの場として無償でMastodonサービスを提供します。 下記ルール守っていただければ使い方は基本的に自由です。プールにぷかぷか浮かぶペンギンのようにのんびりお過ごしください。 要望があれば管理人へご連絡ください。

運用主体

PenguinHUBはMastodonホスティングサービス（hostdon）を利用した個人運用のインスタンスとなっています。 ワンオペに限界を感じたら管理人とモデレーターにより構成されるPenguinHUB運営チームにより、複数人で運営する体制をとるかもです。

注意点

  • hostdonのメンテナンスや障害により、当インスタンスへ影響が発生する場合がございます。その場合は復旧まで気長にお待ちください
  • ルールから逸脱したユーザーを見かけた場合、活動の制限・停止措置を取らせていただく場合がございます。ご了承ください
  • 大切な写真や動画のバックアップの場としては使用しないでください（サービス終了したら投稿したメディアファイルも消える可能性があるため）
  • サーバーに過負荷を与える行為はご遠慮ください
  • 動画は40MB以内でないと投稿できません。ご了承ください。Youtubeにアップロードしてリンクをこちらに貼る方法がおすすめです

その他

  • iOSアプリ　https://apps.apple.com/jp/app/mastodon-for-iphone-and-ipad/id1571998974

Description:
わくわく鮟鱇ランドって？

わくわく鮟鱇ランドは住民がみなわくわくしているMastodonサーバです。後述するルールを守っている限りにおいて、投稿できる内容に特に制限はありません。

わくわくルール

わくわく鮟鱇ランドのユーザは、次のルールを全て守らなければなりません。

  • （少なくとも表面上は）仲良くしてください。
    • なお仲良くできそうにない場合は、ブロックやミュートといった手段を活用してください。
  • 突然サーバのデータが吹っ飛んでも怒らないでください。
    • わくわく鮟鱇ランドが動作するサーバは定期的にバックアップされていますが、完全とは言えません。データが喪失した場合でも残しておきたい投稿は、各自でバックアップしておくことをおすすめしています。
  • 日本国の法律に従ってください。
    • サーバ上でのごたごたは、基本的に日本国の法律に従い対応します。
  • 公序良俗を守ってください。

上記を満たさない言動をした場合、事前の通告なしにアカウント停止などの措置を講ずる場合があります。

Tips: そのような言動をしたい場合は、わくわく鮟鱇ランド以外（例：現実・Twitter）で行ってください。

わくわく新規登録

現在、わくわく鮟鱇ランドへの新規登録は、原則として受け付けていません。ただし、どうしても登録したい方は、艮鮟鱇に適当な方法で連絡してください。状況に応じて判断します。

わくわく寄付

後の「わくわく鮟鱇ランド運営経費」の項に掲げるように、わくわく鮟鱇ランドの維持にはお金がかかっています。安定的な運営のために、わくわく鮟鱇ランドでは寄付を受け付けています。寄付はサーバ管理費に余裕を生み出すと同時に、鮟鱇が運営をする一定のモチベーションを保つことに繋がります。鮟鱇のサーバ管理を手助けしたいと思われる方は、ぜひご検討をお願いいたします。

寄付方法は次のとおりです。ここに載っていない方法で寄付をしたい場合は鮟鱇までご連絡ください。

  • Amazonギフト券を送る：Amazonギフト券のページからushitora@anqou.net宛てにAmazonギフト券をお送りください。
  • GitHub Sponsor になる：GitHub Sponsorsのページから登録ください。

Description:
Welcome to Growers Social!

This server was primarily set up to be a home for all green thumbs. While we would love to welcome anyone with a green thumb hobby, we, unfortunately, will be limiting registrations for the time being to manual approval. Generally, this process takes less than 24 hours on a average day.

When attempting to register please list the reason you would like to join this specific instance that pertains to growing things.

E-mails may be delayed when registering, if need be try to resend them as needed. You might also check your spam box for these if they don't show in your inbox.

We tend to delay defederating with other servers as much as possible. We reserve this for truly horrific site content or spam that is harmful to our members or illegal in the United States. We leave the nitty gritty up to you to mute out as you choose.

We are a social group that is like-minded, don't feel as though all posts have to be about what you grow. Rather we want to create a small tight-knit community full of social interactions. In addition to grown items please feel free to share your daily life, interesting technologies, pets & animals, and anything that makes you, well you.

Code of Conduct

This document lays out the ground rules for participating in the growers.social community. It is intended to protect all members of our community from harassment and to ensure that our community is as welcoming and inclusive as possible. This is a working document, so the growers.social team may amend this CoC to better meet these goals in the future.

The following guidelines are not a legal document, and the final interpretation is up to the administration of growers.social; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

  1. The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:
    1. Excessive advertising
    2. Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources
    3. Untagged nudity, pornography, and sexually explicit content, including artistic depictions
    4. Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence, including artistic depictions
    5. Fake news, anti-vaccination spam
  2. The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:
    1. Racism or advocation of racism
    2. Sexism or advocation of sexism
    3. Casteism or advocation of casteism
    4. Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof
    5. Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism
  3. The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:
    1. Sexual depictions of children
    2. Content illegal in the United States
    3. Any holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism
    4. Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism
  4. Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, impede other users from utilizing the service, degrade the performance of the service, harass other users, or incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:
    1. Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.
    2. Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person’s demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.
    3. Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user’s access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

Goals

  • Provide a friendly, safe, and welcoming environment for everyone, regardless of the level of experience, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion, nationality, political affiliation, or other similar characteristics.
  • Create a supportive community, where people freely share their passions and are excited and positive about each other’s successes.
  • Provide a venue for casual conversations.

Non-Goals

While it’s important to know what growers.social is, it’s just as important to understand what we’re not. growers.social is not:

  • A free speech zone. growers.social is a community with specific — and high — standards of behavior. If you would like to exercise your full free speech rights, you can do so somewhere else; while on growers.social, you should agree to follow the community rules set out in this CoC.
  • An advocacy space. There are many important, controversial, and political issues; and advocating for what you believe is important. However, growers.social is not the place for that advocacy. Even correct views can violate our CoC.

Reporting Volations

If you notice a toot that violates this code of conduct, please report it. It is easy to assume that someone else has already reported a toot, but it is easy for everyone to feel that way and no one to report the toot.

Description:
Bertha Maria Júlia Lutz foi uma ativista feminista, bióloga, educadora, diplomata e política brasileira. É com orgulho que criamos essa instância voltada para falantes de português brasileiro como uma homenagem a essa extraordinária mulher.

Nossa intenção é agregar pessoas que tenham afinidade com as diversas áreas da ciência, da divulgação científica e do jornalismo científico. Também desejamos oferecer um espaço acolhedor e menos tóxico, mais progressista, tolerante e democrático. Um ponto de encontro que permita o debate necessário e sadio sobre a produção científica brasileira e as questões sociais.

Nossa equipe:

Administradores/moderadores:

@rpasa
@inoue
@eltonfc (webmaster)
@rmtakata
@althieme

Dicas para melhor utilizar o Bertha.Social

Ajuste seu perfil. Coloque foto/figura. Coloque uma biografia, comente um pouco sobre você. Isso ajuda que as pessoas te sigam de volta. Também é bacana começar fixando uma postagem de apresentação.

Suas postagens públicas (ver abaixo “níveis de privacidade”), além de serem publicadas no seu perfil também aparecem na linha global e na linha local.

A linha local publica as postagens públicas de outros participantes a Bertha.Social. A linha global publica as postagens públicas de instâncias às quais os membros de Bertha.Social se relacionam (seguindo ou sendo seguidos por seus participantes).

Na linha global você encontrará muita gente bacana para começar a seguir e montar sua linha do tempo pessoal e suas postagens permitirão que outros te encontrem e respondam antes mesmo de começar a te seguir.

Na dúvida, pergunte. A comunidade está pronta para tirar suas dúvidas rapidamente.

Sobre Níveis de Privacidade

No Mastodon, cada post pode ser postado em quatro diferentes configurações de audiência: Pública - suas postagens aparecem em todas as timelines (seu perfil, global e local, além de seus seguidores); Não Listada - suas postagens aparecem para todos, mas não são entregues em linhas públicas; Privada - suas postagens aparecem apenas para seus seguidores; Direta - sua postagem aparece apenas para quem for mencionado.

É importante ter em mente as diferentes configurações, pois certas regras só se aplicam a determinadas configurações.

No Mastodon, Mensagens Diretas (DMs) são mensagens cujo nível de privacidade foi ajustado para “Apenas pessoas mencionadas”, não há caixa em separado ou área específica;

No Mastodon, nenhum post, incluindo mensagens diretas (DM), é criptografado de ponta-a-ponta. Administradores podem ter acesso a todas as mensagens, mas no Bertha.social isso acontecerá apenas com expressa autorização dos envolvidos ou por mandado judicial.

Compromisso: A equipe Bertha.social se compromete a avisar com pelo menos três meses de antecedência caso haja decisão de desligar o servidor.
